oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the Hausdorff Continuity of Free L\`evy Processes and Free Convolution Semigroups
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Williams, John D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Operator Algebras
Mathematics - Classical Analysis and ODEs
Mathematics - Probability
46L54, 30E20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let $\mu$ denote a Borel probability measure and let $\{ \mu_{t} \}_{t\geq 1}$ denote the free additive convolution semigroup of Nica and Speicher. We show that the support of these measures varies continuously in the Hausdorff metric for $t >1$. We utilize complex analytic methods and, in particular, a characterization of the absolutely continuous portion of these supports due to Huang.
Comment: Small revisions at the referees behest. To be published in the Journal of Mathematical Analysis and its Applications
